name: queue
description: Add, remove, view, and clear the queue

options.name: add
options.description: Add a song to the queue

options.name: song-name
options.description: The name of the song to queue

options.name: album
options.description: Add an album to the queue

options.name: album-name
options.description: The name of the album to add to the queue

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a song from the queue

options.name: song-name
options.description: The name of the song to remove from the queue

options.name: show
options.description: View which songs are currently in the queue
